name: Pew Pew Boom (Suryadeepto_Sengupta)
description:
This Project is developed in Unity as part of the Game Design and Development course by Michigan State University.

Modification done are,

  1. Designed custom logo and splash screen
  2. Designed main menu screen and Instruction's screen
  3. Designed each Level around a theme
    1. Level 1: Space Station
    2. Level 2: Planets
    3. Level 3: Galaxy
  4. Used Spawners and increased the difficulty gradually.

Author: Suryadeepto Sengupta

(Assets by MSU)
